title: Get your email PW within Thunderbird
content: Is there a way to get your email password within Thunderbird? I'm trying to add TB to a new computer but it is not taking the password that I thought I was using.
creator: JudsonMcCranie

title: Cannot send email on Thunderbird, but only receive.
content: Long time user, but suddenly I cannot send email on Thunderbird. I receive message: "ELNK003. Error code 308. Verify email address in Account Settings". All appears OK to me, but I cannot send , but only receive. Thanks, Michael Opitz [edited] @mindspring.com Cell: [edited phone# from community support forum]
creator: mopitz

title: Transferring Address book  from my PC to a laptop
content: Good Morning, I donate to Thunderbird on a regular basis. I have had bought for me a new Lenovo Laptop. I have managed to install Thundebird OK but my address book has not moved over to my Laptop. Why has this not happened & could be so kind as to instruct me on how to resolve it. Iam 86 & registered as disabled & my Computer skills are a little limited. I have tried to import the addres book but have not succeeded. Regards Peter Alexander Carr 0744 393 5419
creator: assheton63

title: thunderbird problem
content: I installed mozilla thunderbird on the new computer and copied the settings and messages from the old computer. I got two folders that can't be deleted and can't be used and they're dirty and won't let me move anything into them. When I close and reopen the program, those two folders become 4 folders, multiplied and one can always be deleted and appear again.
creator: monoplast022

title: Mails forsvinder
content: Hej. Hvad skal jeg gøre så vores mail ikke forsvinder. Jeg kan kun finde mails fra 2024. Alle de mails jeg har gemt i mapper, som f.eks garantibevis og andre mails der skal gemmes, er væk. Håber I kan hjælpe. Vh. birte
creator: jobis1

title: Thunderbird stopped downloading messages, I'm using Yahoo and Cox
content: Hello Team, About a month ago Thunderbird stopped downloading new messages, on my desktop pc. I have a Cox email account, and about a year ago they switched to using Yahoo. It's been working fine until last month. When I open TB, the inbox count of unread messages keeps climbing, but it's not adding new emails. I think it's actually adding duplicates of already downloaded emails. Some of which it looks like it is adding several copies, like 3 or 4. Can you tell me where to start? Many thanks.
creator: ljcaputo
